resources.string: Thoroughbred racetrack\'s casino has horse bets, poker & other table games, dining & entertainment.
Amusement Park has 44 acres of roller coasters, water slides, kids\' shows, a castle & campgrounds.
Brand-name candy store stocking a huge selection of chocolate, sweets, collectibles & gifts.
Hershey\'s chocolate-themed park for rides, kids\' activities, dining, live shows & all-things cocoa.
